fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value:
You may do 1 of 2 things
 - Raise your video quality to 1440p until 3 turns pass: At any point before your turns, if you have a card that exactly match up with the top color (<:red:1106234051129507932> + <:black:1106265022453268530> with <:red:1106234051129507932> + <:black:1106265022453268530>, not <:red:1106234051129507932> + <:yellow:1106234135384699023>) or with the final 2 digits of the last card played, you may jump in with that card.
 - Reduce someone else's video quality to 180p: Any effects of cards played are delayed by 2 turns.

fields.name: - Flipped (<:pink:1106716301843497030> + <:white:1107514189574045726>):
fields.value:
Both of the following effects occur
 - Raise your video quality to 4K until 3 turns pass: All cards in your hand that have at least all but 1 color present in the top card can be played at any point.
 - Reduce someone else's video quality to 144p: Any effects of cards played are delayed by 3 turns.
